MetaClass.name: Experiment
MetaClass.documentation:
A description of an NMR experiment. This corresponds to a single collection of data and so is roughly equivalent to a single Bruker expName/n or a Varian .. directory. The data model contains no description of either a generic experiment or a combination of pulse sequence, sample, conditions and so on that may be recorded several times.
Creating an Experiment autiomatically creates the correct number of ExpDims as well.

MetaRole.name: experiments
MetaRole.documentation: Nmr Experiments referring to Citation

MetaRole.name: citations
MetaRole.documentation: Citation for NMR experiment pulse sequence.

MetaRole.name: dataLists
MetaRole.documentation: measurement lists valid for Experiment. There can be several, seeing that there may be measurements of different types.

MetaRole.name: dataSources
MetaRole.documentation: child link

MetaRole.name: derivedNmrExperiments
MetaRole.documentation: Nmr.Experiments derived using Method

MetaRole.name: derivationMethod
MetaRole.documentation: Method used to derive Experiment - only meaningful for Experiments where derivedFrom is not empty

MetaRole.name: derivedFrom
MetaRole.documentation: Experiments from which the current Experiment is derived

MetaRole.name: derivedTo
MetaRole.documentation: Experiments that are derived from the data in this one.

MetaAttribute.name: details
MetaAttribute.documentation: Free text, for notes, explanatory comments, etc.

MetaRole.name: dipolarRelaxList
MetaRole.documentation: Dipole-diploe relaxation list valid for Experiment

MetaRole.name: expDims
MetaRole.documentation: child link

MetaAttribute.name: experimentType
MetaAttribute.documentation: RefExperiment.name for associated RefExperiment - key to derived link

codeStubs.item: self.refComponentName is None or all(x is self for x in self.nmrProject.findAllExperiments(refComponentName=self.refComponentName , experimentType=value))

MetaRole.name: hExchProtectionList
MetaRole.documentation: Hydrogen exchange protection factor list valid for experiment

MetaRole.name: hExchRateList
MetaRole.documentation: Hydrogen exchange rate list valid for experiment

MetaRole.name: isotropicS2List
MetaRole.documentation: isotroisc order parameter list valid for Experiment

MetaRole.name: jCouplingList
MetaRole.documentation: JcouplingList valid for Experiment

MetaRole.name: experiments
MetaRole.documentation: Nmr.Experiments labeled according to LabeledMixture

MetaRole.name: labeledMixtures
MetaRole.documentation: LabeledMixtures that describe molecules for Experiment. There should be only one LabeledMixture for every Molecule, but the constraint is not currently enforced.

MetaRole.name: nmrExperiments
MetaRole.documentation: Nmr Experiments carried out on MolSystem

MetaRole.name: molSystems
MetaRole.documentation: MolSystems involved in Experiment

MetaAttribute.name: name
MetaAttribute.documentation: name of Experiment, freely chosen and modifiable. Used for user experiment ID, e.g. lab book reference.

MetaRole.name: nmrExpSeries
MetaRole.documentation: Experiment series that involve experiment

MetaAttribute.name: nmrTubeType
MetaAttribute.documentation: text field describing NMR tube type. E.g. "Shigemi 10mm"

MetaRole.name: noeList
MetaRole.documentation: List of homonuclear NOEs for experiment

MetaAttribute.name: numScans
MetaAttribute.documentation: Number of transients averaged per data point. A single scan for a complex point counts as numScans 1, not 2.

MetaRole.name: pkaList
MetaRole.documentation: pKa list valid for Experiment

MetaRole.name: experiments
MetaRole.documentation: Experiments acquired with probe.

MetaRole.name: probe
MetaRole.documentation: Probe used for acquiring experiment

MetaRole.name: rawData
MetaRole.documentation: DataSource containing raw unprocessed data for experiment.

MetaRole.name: rdcList
MetaRole.documentation: List of Reduced Dipolar Couplings for Experiment

MetaRole.name: refComponent
MetaRole.documentation: AbstractComponent for which this experiment is a referenceExperiment

MetaAttribute.name: refComponentName
MetaAttribute.documentation: The experiment is a reference experiment for the AbstractComponent with this name. Key for derived link refComponent

codeStubs.item: value is None or all(x is self for x in self.nmrProject.findAllExperiments(refComponentName=value, experimentType=self.experimentType))

MetaRole.name: refExperiment
MetaRole.documentation: Reference experiment corresponding to Experiment. NB Setting the refExperiment sets teh refExperimentName AND resets the ExpDimRef.axisCodes to matching RefExpDimRef.axisCodes, if possible.

MetaRole.name: nmrExperiments
MetaRole.documentation: Nmr experiments carried out on Sample

MetaRole.name: sample
MetaRole.documentation: Sample on which experiment is carried out.

codeStubs.item: value is None or not value.isVirtual

MetaRole.name: sampleConditionSet
MetaRole.documentation: Set of sample conditions that apply to an experiment

MetaAttribute.name: serial
MetaAttribute.documentation: Serial number of object. Serves as object main key. Serial numbers of deleted objects are not re-used. Serial numbers can only be set by the implementation. Values are in practice always positive, since negative values are interpreted as a signal to set the next free serial

codeStubs.item:
if value is not None: name = value.name self.experimentType = name
# Set expDimRef.axisCode to match RefExpDimRef axisCodes, linking the two objects from ccpn.util.Common import _axisCodeMapIndices expDimRefs= [y for x in self.sortedExpDims() for y in x.sortedExpDimRefs()] refAxisCodes = [y.axisCode for x in value.sortedRefExpDims() for y in x.sortedRefExpDimRefs()] if not value.isReversed: # expDims are in order of first traversd, but we want to give priority # to the acquisition dimension, so map them in order acquisition-first. Hence the reversal refAxisCodes.reverse() indexMapping = _axisCodeMapIndices([x.axisCode for x in expDimRefs], refAxisCodes) if indexMapping: for ii, axisCode in enumerate(refAxisCodes): index = indexMapping[ii] if index is not None: expDimRefs[index].axisCode = axisCode

MetaOperation.name: setShiftList
MetaOperation.documentation: setter for shiftList - includes shift averaging

MetaRole.name: shiftAnisotropyList
MetaRole.documentation: ShiftAnisotropyList valid for Experiment

MetaRole.name: shiftDifferenceList
MetaRole.documentation: Chemical shift difference list relevant for Experiment

MetaRole.name: shiftList
MetaRole.documentation: Chemical shift list relevant for Experiment

MetaRole.name: shiftReferences
MetaRole.documentation: Shift references used for Experiment

MetaRole.name: spectralDensityList
MetaRole.documentation: List of spectral densities valid for Experiment

MetaRole.name: experiments
MetaRole.documentation: Nmr Experiments carried out on spectrometer.

MetaRole.name: spectrometer
MetaRole.documentation: Spectrometer used for Experiment

MetaAttribute.name: spinningAngle
MetaAttribute.documentation: NMR tube spinning angle (in degrees) relative to the magnet bore axis.

MetaRole.name: t1List
MetaRole.documentation: T1 measurement list valid for Experiment.

MetaRole.name: t1RhoList
MetaRole.documentation: List of T1rho relaxation valid for Experiment

MetaRole.name: t2List
MetaRole.documentation: T2 list valid for Experiment

MetaAttribute.name: userExpCode
MetaAttribute.documentation: User experiment code; typically referes to external data organisation. E.g. lab book page or lab book ID.
